title: Colombia’s President Visits Venezuela, Moving Away From Isolation
description: Colombia’s new president met with his Venezuelan counterpart, a milestone in the move by leftist leaders in Latin America to ease the isolation of Nicolás Maduro’s government in Caracas.
dc:creator: Isayen Herrera and Julie Turkewitz
media:credit: Federico Rios for The New York Times
media:description: President Gustavo Petro of Colombia with President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela on Tuesday in Caracas.
